translation: O Lord Sai, the uplifter of the Universe, residing in Parti, You are the bestower of all auspiciousness. You absolve all sins, destroy the fear of samsara - You are the beautiful light of our eyes. Victory to our Lord Sai.

title: Jagath Palana Jagan Mohana
lyrics:
Jagath Palana Jagan Mohana
Sundara Sai Gopalana
Munijana Sevita Madhusudhana
Jagath Palana Jagan Mohana
Keshava Govinda Janardana
Shridhara Madhava Damodara
Achyuta Ananta Narayana
Sri Sai Krishna Narayana (2)
translation: O Lord, the protector of the Universe, the bewitcher of the Universe, O beautiful Sai Gopala, the One who serves the Rishis, the One who destroyed the demon Madhu, Keshava, Govinda, Janaardhana, Sridhara, Madhava, Damodara, Achyutha, Anantha, Narayana, Sai Krishna (different names for Lord Krishna).

title: Jago Jago Jago Shankara
lyrics:
Jago Jago Jago Shankara
Jago Jago Saishvara
Jago Jago Jago Shankara
Halahaladhara He Paramesha
He Tripurari Jaya Parthisha
Gangadhara Shankara
Shiva Gowrivara Shankara
Hara Gangadhara Shankara
Satya Saishvara Shankara
translation: Awake, O Lord Shankar, awake O Lord Sai, to confer auspiciousness on all. Salutations to the great Lord who drank the deadly poison and held it in His throat who slew the demon Tripura and received the celestial river Ganga on his head. Victory to Shiva and to Lord Sai.

title: Jago Jago Maa Shankari Maa
lyrics:
Jago Jago Maa Shankari Maa
Shankari Maa Abhayankari Maa
Jaya Jaya Bhavani Maa
Jago Jago Maa Shankari Maa
Matha Maheshwari Parvathi Maa
Devi Dhaya Karo Shiva Ramana
Janani Trilokha Palini Maa
Jaya Jaya Bhavani Maa
translation: O auspicious Mother Parvathi (Amba), sustainer of three Worlds and destroyer of fear, please wake up. Victory to You, Mother Bhavani. (Wake up means to be aware of atmic reality latent in us).

title: Jai Hari Bol Jai Sita Ram Gopi Gopala Bhajo Radhe Shyam
lyrics:
Jai Hari Bol Jai Sita Ram Gopi Gopala Bhajo Radhe Shyam
Hare Ram Ram Ram Ghana Shyam Shyam Shyam
Shri Raghu Nandhana Shri Rama Dasharathe Jaya Raghu Rama
Nandha Kishora Navanitha Chora Brindhavana Govinda Lala
Hare Ram Ram Ram Ghana Shyam Shyam Shyam
translation: Chant the names of Rama, Lord of Sita, prince of King Dadharatha of Raghu dynasty; of Hari, Gopala, Radhey Shyam; and Lord Krishna of Brindhavan, son of Nandha, who stole butter from Gopis as a child.

title: Jai Jai Jai Gana Nayaka
lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Gana Nayaka Jai Jai Vigna Vinashaka
Jai Shubha Managala Dhayaka Vidya Buddhi Pradhayaka
Gajavadana Gowri Nandana (2)
Gangadhara Shiva Shambo Nandana
translation: Salutations to Ganesha who removes obstacles and bestows auspiciousness, intellect and knowledge; to the elephant-faced son of Gowri and Shiva

title: Jai Jai Jai Jai Ganapathi Deva
lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Jai Ganapathi Deva
Gajanana Gajanana
Gajanana He Ganapathi Deva
Jai Jai Jai Jai Ganapathi Deva
Matha Parvathi Pitha Maha Deva (2)
Gajanana Gajanana
Gajanana He Ganapathi Deva
translation: Victory to Lord Ganapathi, (Lord Ganesha), the son of Mother Parvathi and Lord Mahadeva.

title: Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani Ambe Bhavani Maa
lyrics:
Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani Ambe Bhavani Maa
Jaya Maa Jaya Maa
Sai Bhavani Maa(Sathya)
Simha Vahini Trishula Dharini Ambe Bhavani Maa
Jaya Jaya Janani Sai Janani Parthi Nivasini Maa
Jaya Maa Jaya Maa
Sai Bhavani Maa (Sathya)
translation: Glory to Mother Sai, Amba and Bhavani. Mother Amba holds a trident, and her vehicle is a lion. Sing in glory to Mother Sai.

title: Jai Jai Prabhu Giridhari Natavara Nandalala
lyrics: Jai Jai Prabhu Giridhari Natavara Nandalala\nNatavara Nandalala Hey Giridhari Gopala\nHe Giridhari Gopala He Giridhari Gopala He Giridhari Gopala
translation: Glory to the Lord who held up the mountain; Krishna, the great dancer, beloved son of Nanda; O cowherd boy who supported the mountain.

title: Jai Jai Ram Govindha Hari Hari
lyrics: Jai Jai Ram Govinda Hari Hari (3)\nJanaki Ram Govinda Hari Hari (3)\nSai Ram Govinda Hari Hari (3)
translation: Glory be to Lord Rama, beloved of Mother Janaki, Lord Govinda Hari - the stealer of our hearts and Lord Sai who resides in Parthi.

title: Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari
lyrics:
Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari
Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari
Jai Jai Ram Sai Hari
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari
translation: Glory be to Lord Rama, Lord Krishna (Hari) and Lord Sai Ram.

title: Jai Sairam Jai Sairam
lyrics:
Jai Sairam Jai Sairam
Premavatara Sai Avatara
Jai Sairam Jai Sairam
Ramavatara Sai Raghu Rama
Krishnavatara Sai Ghanashyama
Yuga Avatara Sai Bhagavan
Sarvavatara Satya Sai Rama
translation: Victory to Lord Sai Ram whose form is Love Incarnate. Lord Sathya Sai, the incarnations is all incarnations, is also Rama, Krishna and Shiva.

title: Janaki Jivana Rama Raghuvira
lyrics:
Janaki Jivana Rama Raghuvira
Jaya Bhuvaneshwara Raghava Sundara
Janaki Jivana Rama Raghuvira
Ravi Kula Mandana Asura Nikhandana
Parama Niranjana Rama (Sai)
Jaya Bhuvaneshwara Raghava Sundara
translation: King Rama, Lord of the Universe, the jewel of Raghu (Solar) dynasty, and the Lord of Sita, is the destroyer of evils, and the remover of fear. Glory be to the ever pure Lord Rama.

title: Janani Janani
lyrics:
Janani Janani Sathya Sai Shubha Janani
Jagat Karani Paripurani Saishwari Janani
Sathya Swaroopini Janani
Dharma Samvardhani Janani
Shantha Swaroopini Janani
Prema Pradhayini Janani
translation: Mother Sai, embodiment of auspiciousness, Mother of the Universe, all encompassing and promoter of righteousness (dharma), is the personification of truth and peace and bestower of love.

title: Janani Sai Devi Dayamayi
lyrics:
Janani Sai Devi Dayamayi
Janani Ma Krupalini Ma
Tum Ho Prema Svarupini Ma
Daya Karo Satya Sai Ma
Krupa Karo Satya Sai Ma
Janani Prema Dayini Ma
translation: Lord Sai is the compassionate and merciful mother. You are the embodiment of love. Sai! Please shower us with your compassion and love.

title: Jaya Ganaraya Shri Ganaraya
lyrics:
Jaya Ganaraya Shri Ganaraya
Jaya Ganaraya Shri Ganaraya Mangala Murthi Moraya
Siddhi Vinayaka Mangala Dhatha
Ashta Vinayaka Mangala Dhayaka Mangala Murthi Moraya
Sindhura Vadhana Pankaja Charana
Sindhura Vadhana Pankaja Ramana Ganapathi Bappa Moraya
translation: Worship at the lotus feet of the eight forms of the elephant- faced Lord Ganesha who grants wishes and bestows prosperity and well-being.

title: Jaya Gopala Jaya Gopala
lyrics:
Jaya Gopala Jaya Gopala
Jaya Sai Govinda Gopala
Jaya Gopala Jaya Gopala
Chinmayanandha Hey Sai Gopala
Nithyanandha Rupa Sai Gopala
Jaya Sai Govinda Gopala
translation: Glory to Gopala (the cowherd boy, Krishna), the mind pleasing embodiment of constant bliss, and to Lord Sai.

title: Jaya Guru Deva Prabhu Sai Deva
lyrics:
Jaya Guru Deva Prabhu Sai Deva
Devadi Deva Pranamamyaham
Shiva Shiva Shambho Kailasa Pate
Partipurishvara Palaya Mam
Devadi Deva Paranamamyaham
translation: Victory to Lord Sai, the God of Gods, to whom I bow. O Lord Shiva, the Lord of Kailasha and of Parthi, please protect me.

title: Jaya Guru Jaya Guru Sai Ram
lyrics:
Jaya Guru Jaya Guru Sai Ram
Jagat Guru Sathya Sai Ram
Jaya Guru Jaya Guru Sai Ram
Brahma Vishnu Shiva Sai Ram
Parabrahma Rupa Sai Ram
Matha Pitha Guru Sai Ram
Jagat Guru Sathya Sai Ram
translation: Hail to the Universal teacher, Sathya Sai Ram, the creator, maintainer and destroyer. He is the embodiment of divinity, and the Universal mother, father and teacher.

title: Jaya Guru Omkara Jaya Jaya Sadguru Omkara Om
lyrics: Jaya Guru Omkara Jaya Jaya Sadguru Omkara Om\nBrahma Vishnu Sada Shiva\nHara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
translation: Glory to the Guru who is the embodiment of the sacres Om, the true guru Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva

title: Jaya Jagadeesha Hare Jaya Govindha Hare
lyrics:
Jaya Jagadeesha Hare Jaya Govinda Hare
Nithyananda Brahmananda Jaya Gopala Hare
Arunachala Shiva Om Trishuladhari Shivom
Hari Narayana Om Sai Narayana Om
Jaya Devi Bharathi Vidhya Dhayini Annapoorna Mata Om
translation: Glory to the Lord of the Universe, Lord Govinda, the eternally and perpetually blissful One. Chant the name of the Lord of Arunachala, Lord Shiva, holding the Trishula (trident). Salutations to Mother Goddess Bharathi (Saraswathi), who bestows strength and knowledge.

title: Jaya Jaya Girija Bala Gajanana
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Girija Bala Gajanana
Jaya Shiva Shankara Parvati Nandana
Vigna Vinashaka Vijaya Gajanana
Sharavana Sevitha Sumukha Gajanana
Tava Pada Sharanam Sharanam Gajanana
translation: Salutations to Lord Ganesha, son of Girija (Parvati) and Shiva, destroyer of obstacles and bestower of success. We take refuge at the feet of pleasant, elephant-faced Gajanana, adored by Lord Subramanyam.

title: Jaya Jaya Jaya He Shri Guru Natha
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya He Shri Guru Natha
Jaya Jaya Jaya He Sadguru Natha
Sadguru Natha Sadguru Natha
Sadguru Natha Shri Sai Natha
Sathya Svaroopa Shiva Guru Natha
Antaryami Vishva Vidhata
Mukti Pradata Sai Guru Natha
translation: Glory to Divine Master, Lord Sai, who is the embodiment of truth. He is the indweller, supporter of the Universe and grantor of liberation.

title: Jaya Jaya Krishna Yadhunandana
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Krishna Yadhunandana
Jaya Jaya Brindavana Chandana
Jaya Jaya Krishna Yadhunandana
Jaya Jaya Krishna Manamohana
Jaya Jaya Sai Gopalana (2X)
translation: Glory to Lord Krishna, Prince of Yadhu dynasty, the enchanting Sai, Krishna, and Gopala, who showers bliss on residents of Brindavan.

title: Jaya Jaya Ram Jagadhabhi Ram
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Ram Jagadhabhi Ram
Dina Bandhu Sai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram Sai Ram
Dhanava Bhanjana Dhaya Maya
Dhaya Maya Kripa Maya
Alakha Niranjana Asura Nikhandana
Dina Bhandhu Sai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram Sai Ram
translation: Salutations to Lord Rama who has enchanted the whole Universe, the friend of the downtrodden, and destroyer of demons (demonic tendencies). He is ocean of mercy, imperceptible and faultless.

title: Jaya Jaya Rama Jaya Raghu Rama
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Rama Jaya Raghu Rama Dasharatha -
Nandana Raja Rama
Abhaya Pradayaka Ananda Dayaka
Tribhuvana Mohana Sai Rama
Danava Bhanjana Dinoddharana
Prema Sagara Sai Rama
translation: Glory to the beloved son of King Dasharatha, Lord Rama He is the grantor of peace by destroying fear. O Ocean of Pure Love, Lord Sai Ram! You are loved by three worlds. You are the uplifter of the weak and miserable, and you are the destroyer of evil qualities.

title: Jaya Jaya Shankara Sambashiva
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Shankara Sambashiva
Jaya Parthishwara Sai Shiva
Jaya Jaya Shankara Sambashiva
Vyagrambaradhara Vibhuthi Sundara
Ganga Jatadhara Gauri Manohara
Narthana Sundara Natana Manohara
Parthipuri Paramesha Shiva
translation: Glory to Lord Shankara (Shiva), beautifully adorned with holy ash and tiger skin. The enchanting Lord of Gauri wears the Holy Ganges in His matted hair and is the graceful divine dancer. The Lord of Parthi is the embodiment of Lord Shiva.

title: Jaya Panduranga Prabho Vitthala
lyrics:
Jaya Panduranga Prabho Vitthala
Jagadhoddhara Hari Vitthala
Panduranga Vitthala Pandari Natha Vitthala
Sri Ramani Hr'dayantharanga
Mangala Kara Karunantharanga
Ashrita Dina Janavana Ranga
Jagadhoddhara Hari Vitthala
Panduranga Vitthala Pandari Natha Vitthala
translation: Salutations to Lord Panduranga, Hari and Vitthala, the savior of the entire world. Chant the names of Lord Panduranga and Vitthala, the Lord of Pandari, who is the bestower of auspiciousness, the enchanter of hearts and the supporter of those who are afflicted and miserable.

title: Jaya Parthisha Jaya Paramesha
lyrics:
Jaya Parthisha Jaya Paramesha
Jaya Gaurisha Jaya Gangadhara
Jatadhara Jaya Sai Shankara
Vijayi Bhava Tava Sharanam Dehi (2)
Sharanam Dehi
translation: Victory to the Supreme Lord, our Lord in Parthi. Victory to the Lord of Mother Gauri, Victory to the one who has the river Ganga in His matted locks. O Lord may Your Mission be Victorious. We seek refuge, please grant us your protection.

title: Jaya Rama Raghu Rama
lyrics:
Jaya Rama Raghu Rama
Ranandhira Sukumara
Jaya Rama Raghu Rama
Raghupati Raghava Raja Rama
Rajiva Lochana Rama Rama
translation: Salutations to the lotus-eyed, beautiful and young hero of the war for righteousness, Lord Rama of the Raghu dynasty.

title: Jaya Shri Ganesha Vighna Nasha Gajanana
lyrics:
Jaya Shri Ganesha Vighna Nasha Gajanana
Vidya Buddhi Sarva Siddhi Puranjana
Jaya Heramba Shri Jagadamba Nandana
Ekadanta Dayavanta Shubhanana
Mangala Dayaka Shri Vinayaka Vandana
translation: Salutations to Lord Ganesha, the destroyer of obstacles and the grantor of intelligence and success. Worship the beloved, beautiful, auspicious Lord Vinayaka, who has one tusk, and is the son of the Mother of the Universe.

title: Jhulana Jhulaye Brija Bala
lyrics:
Jhulana Jhulaye Brija Bala
Jhule Nandalala Jhule Sai Bala
Jhulana Jhulaye Brija Bala
Resham Ki Dori Sone Ki Palana
Arati Utare Brija Bala
Jhule Nandalala Jhule Sai Bala
translation: The children of Brija have built a swing for Nanada's son, Krishna, who is also Sai. Yashoda rocks the child Krishna in a swing made of gold with silk ropes and the children of Brija offer arati to Him.

title: Jivan Tere Havale Prabhu
lyrics:
Jivan Tere Havale Prabhu Ise Pag Pag Tu Hi Samhale
Pag Pag Tu Hi Samhalete Ho Pag Pag Tu Hi Samhale
Bhava Sagar Me Jivan Naiya Dol Rahi He O Rakhvaiya
Dol Rahi He O Rakhvaiya
Tu Hi Par Lagade Prabhu Ise Pag Pag Tu Hi Samhale
translation: O Lord, I have surrendered the boat of my life to You. Kindly help me cross the ocean of life and death as my life is unsteady and shaky, take care of me at every step of my life.

title: Kalimala Bhanjana Kodanda Rama
lyrics:
Kalimala Bhanjana Kodanda Rama
Karunantharanga Kaivalya Dhama
Kalimala Bhanjana Kodanda Rama
Maya Manusha Muni Jana Prema
Madhura Manohara Mangala Nama
Partipurisha Prabhu Paramatma
Patita Pavana Pattabhi Rama
translation: Lord Rama carrying the Kodanda bow, is a repository of mercy, who bestows liberation and destroys the impurities of the Kali age. His illusory human form and His beautifully enchanting name was worshipped by the sages. He is Lord Sai of Pathi, the eternal and pure Spirit, the savior of the fallen, He who resides in Prashanti Nilayam.

title: Kalyana Krishna Kamaniya Krishna
lyrics:
Kalyana Krishna Kamaniya Krishna
Kalinga Mardana Shri Krishna
Govardhana Giridhari Murari Gopi Mana Sanchari
Brindavan Ki Tulasi Mala
Pithambara Dhari Murari
translation: Lord Krishna has a loving and enchanting form and confers auspiciousness. He annihilated the cobra, named Kalinga, and lifted up the mountain Govardhana. The destroyer of the demon Mura, who resides in Gopi's hearts and in Brindavan, wears a garland of Tulsi leaves and a yellow colored robe.

title: Kamala Nethra Saishwara
lyrics:
Kamala Nethra Saishwara
Kaivalya Theja Sureshwara
Kamala Nethra Saishwara
Megha Shyama Ghana Gagana Sharira
Shantha Brahma Maya Abhaya Kara (2)
translation: Lotus-eyed Lord Sai, the effulgent Lord of Gods, bestower of salvation, embodiment of peace and our supreme protector, pervades the whole Universe

title: Kandha Kumara Vadivela
lyrics:
Kandha Kumara Kadirvela
Gauri Puthra Vadivela
Karthikeya Karuna Sagara
Dina Sharanya Vadivela
Shri Sai Natha Vadivela
translation: O Lord Skandha, the youthful one, son of Mother Gauri, ocean of compassion, Lord Sai, You are refuge of the weak.

title: Karuna Sagari Kathyayini
lyrics:
Karuna Sagara He Nandalala
Murali Manohara Shyama Gopala
Karuna Sagara He Nandalala
Giridhara Nagara Sai Gopala
Mira Ke Prabhu Shyama Gopala
translation: Prince of Nanda, an ocean of compassion and the mind-captivating divine flute player, is Lord of Meera and resident of Giridhara Nagara (town).

title: Karuna Sagara He Nandalala
lyrics:
Karuna Sagari Kathyayini
Kadambari Sai Kaliyuga Palini
Karuna Sagari Kathyayini
Kalmasha Nashini Kamitartha Pradhayini
Kanchana Varuni Kaivalya Dhayini
Kamala Vasini Lakshmi Narayani
Parthi Nivasini Sai Narayani
translation: Mother Goddess Sai, protector of the Kali age, removes sins, fulfills our wishes, and bestows wealth and liberation. The consort of Vishnu sits in a lotus flower and resides in Parthi.

title: Karuna Sindhu Dasharatha Nandana
lyrics: Karuna Sindhu Dasharatha Nandana Partipurishvara Ram\nPrema Svarupa Prashanti Niketana Maruti Sevita Ram\nAhalyodharaka Rajiva Lochana Partipurishvara Ram
translation: Lord of Parthi, son of Dasharatha, is the ocean of compassion and the embodiment of love residing in Prashanti. He, who was worshipped by Hanuman and was the savior of the devotee Ahalya, was the lotus-eyed Rama, who is our Lord Sai in Parthi.

title: Karunalavala He Nandalala
lyrics:
Karunalavala He Nandalala
Ravela Ravela Rave Gopala
Brindavana Bala Hey Gopilola
Manamohana Hey Shyama Gopala
Madhusudhana Hey Sai Gopala
Ravela Ravela Rave Gopala
translation: O compassionate son of Nanda, Gopala, young Krishna, residing in Brindavan, enchanter of Gopis, and destroyer of demon Madhu, Sai Gopala, please come.

title: Karunantaranga Kari Raja Varadha
lyrics:
Karunantaranga Kari Raja Varadha Kamalesha Shri Sai Rama
Omkara Rama Prashanti Rama
Parabrahma Sathya Sai Rama
Kamalesha Shri Sai Rama
translation: O lotus-eyed Lord Sai, embodiment of compassion and bestower of blessings, You are the Rama of Prashanti, the Pranava (Om), the supreme being.

title: Kashaya Vesha Dharana
lyrics:
Kashaya Vesha Dharana
Kaliyuga Avathara Radha Ramana
Kashaya Vesha Dharana
Shirdi Sai Shri Sathya Sai
Dwarakamayi Narayana
Chithravathi Tira Narayana Hare
translation: Orange robed incarnation of the Kali age, and the beloved of Radha, is Lord Sathya Sai residing near Chithravathi river. He is Vishnu, and also Shirdi Sai who lived in Dwarakamayi.

title: Kasturi Ranga Kaveri Ranga
lyrics:
Kasturi Ranga Kaveri Ranga
Shri Ranga Ranga Ranga (2)
Kalyana Ranga Karunanta Ranga
Shri Ranga Ranga Ranga (Ranga)
Garuda Gamana Ranga Shesha Sayana Ranga
Shri Ranga Ranga Ranga (Ranga)
translation: Lord Vishnu (Kasturi Ranga) who bestows good fortune is eternally merciful.He reclines on a serpent and uses the eagle as His conveyance.

title: Kaushalyatmaja Rama Charan
lyrics:
Kaushalyatmaja Rama Charan
Vaidehi Priya Rama Charan
Maruti Sevita Rama Charan
Bharatarchita Shri Rama Charan
Ahalyodharaka Rama Charan
Shanti Niketana Rama Charan
Rama Charan Sada Bhajo
translation: Always worship the feet of Lord Rama, who was dear to Sita, served by Hanuman, worshipped by Bharata, and who liberated Ahalya; He is the abode of Peace.

title: Keshava Madhava Jaya Deva Madhusudhana
lyrics:
Keshava Madhava Jaya Deva Madhusudhana
Nethra Kamala Dala Athiva Manohara
Antharyami Prabhu Parameshwara
Maya Manusha Vesha Liladhara (2)
Jaya Deva Madhusudhana
translation: Salutations to Lord Krishna with beautiful hair and eyes like the lotus petals. The exceedingly enchanting Lord is the indweller. He has taken on the illusory human form as part of the divine play.

title: Know That The Lord Is Sweetness Itself
lyrics:
Know That The Lord Is Sweetness Itself
Everything Is A Sign Of His Grace
He's The Nearest, He's The Dearest, Born In the World Now...
...As Sri Sathya Sai
Hold On To Him As Close As You Can
Knowing Him As An Intimate Friend
translation: None

title: Krishna Kanhaiya Krishna Kanhaiya
lyrics:
Krishna Kanhaiya Krishna Kanhaiya
Natavara Nanda Kumara Kanhaiya
Brindavana Ke Bansi Adhariya
Radha Manohara Ras Rachaiya
Giridhara Nagara Shyama Kanhaiya
Shri Madhusudhana Sai Kanhaiya
translation: O Lord Krishna, You play the Divine flute in Brindavan. O son of Nanda, who captured the heart of Radha, You dance with Gopis. O dark-hued Krishna, who lifted the Govardana mountain You are our beloved Sai Krishna too.

title: Krishna Krishna Govinda Krishna
lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Govinda Krishna Gopala Bala Krishna
Nanda Nandana Bhaktha Chandana Bala Lola Krishna
Sundara Vadhana Saroja Nayana Radha Priya Krishna
Yadhava Krishna Yashodha Krishna Sathya Sai Krishna
translation: Chant the many names of Krishna, Govinda, Gopala and Nanda's Son. He delights His devotees with His beautiful face and lotus-shaped eyes., He is also dear to Radha and Yashoda.

title: Krishna Krishna Mukunda Janardhana
lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Mukunda Janardhana
Krishna Govinda Narayana Hare
Achyutananda Govinda Madhava
Satchidananda Narayana Hare
translation: Chant the names of the Lord: Krishna, Janardhana Govinda, Narayana, Achyuta, all of which represent truth, knowledge and bliss.

title: Krishna Krishna Yadhuvara Krishna
lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Yadhuvara Krishna
Mura Hara Keshava Yadhava Madhava
Krishna Krishna Yadhuvara Krishna
Murali Manohara Shyama Murari
Shyama Murari Sai Murari
Mura Hara Keshava Yadhava Madhava
translation: O Krishna of the Yadhu dynasty, O destroyer of the demon Mura, One who plays the enchanting flute, O Murari of dark complexion, O beloved Sai Krishna Who is Keshava and Madhava.

title: Krishna Madhava Madhava Krishna
lyrics:
Krishna Madhava Madhava Krishna
Krishna Madhava Sai Hare
Brindavana Sanchari Shyama Gopala
Jaya Madhusudana Jaya Nandalala
Jhulana Jhule Mere Sai Nandalala
Krishna Madhava Sai Hare
translation: Chant the names of Lord Krishna, Madhava and Sai who moved about in Brindavana. Salutations to Lord Krishna, the son of Nanda and the destroyer of the demon Madhu. Swing in the swings of our hearts, Lord Sai.

title: Krishna Mukunda Govinda Giridhara
lyrics:
Krishna Mukunda Govinda Giridhara
Murali Mohana Narayana
Parthi Purandara Narayana
Hare Parthi Purandara Narayana
Madhava Shri Hari Mandara Giridhari
Govinda Murahari Narayana
Parthi Purandara Narayana (2)
translation: Chant the names of Lord Krishna, Mukunda, Govinda, Narayana and Lord Purandhara of Parthi. He who carried the mountain is Narayana, who slew the demon Mura (in Krishna avatar)

title: Krishna Murari Bhava Bhaya Hari
lyrics: Krishna Murari Bhava Bhaya Hari Hey Giridhari Gopal\nParthi Vihari Hridhaya Vihari Bhaktha Sakha Bhagwan\nHey Bhaktha Sakha Bhagwan Sai Bhaktha Sakha Bhagwan
translation: Lord Krishna, the slayer of the demon Mura, the destroyer of the fears of existence, and the holder of the mountain is the friend and kinsman of devotees. He resides in Parthi and in our hearts.

title: Krishna Rama Govindha Gokula Nandhana Gopala
lyrics:
Krishna Rama Govinda Gokula Nandhana Gopala
Rama Krishna Govinda Jaya Brindhavana Gopala
Sai Krishna Govinda Parthi Pureeshwara Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala (2)
Gopi Manohara Gokula Bala Sai Murari
translation: Different epithets of Lord Krishna are equated to Lord Sai.

title: Krishna Rama Govinda Narayana
lyrics:
Krishna Rama Govinda Narayana
Keshava Madhava Hari Narayana
Krishna Rama Govinda Narayana
Shri Venu Gopala Krishna (2)
Madhava Madhusudana Narayana
translation: Chant the many names of the Lord: Krishna, Rama, Govinda, Narayana, Keshava, Madhava, Hari, Venu Gopala and Madhusudana.

title: Lambodhara Hey Vighneshwara
lyrics:
Lambodhara Hey Vighneshwara
Shambhu Kumara Siddheshvara (Shiva)
Lambodhara Hey Vighneshwara
Ambika Tanaya Omkareshwara
Heramba Sai Shirdishwara
Heramba Sai Partishwara
translation: Pot-bellied Lord Ganesha, the remover of obstacles is the son of Shambhu who grants success. Son of Ambika(Parvati) and the embodiment of Om is the beautiful Sai, Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Lambodhara Shiva Gauri Suta
lyrics:
Lambodhara Shiva Gauri Suta
Ganadhipa Jaya Gajanana
Lambodhara Shiva Gauri Suta
Balachandra Jaya Gaja Karneshwara
Vigneshwara Mam Pahi Prabho
translation: Pot bellied son of Shiva and Parvathi Lord of the Ganas, victory to the elephant faced Lord who is effulgent like the moon Remover of obstacles, protect me O Lord!

title: Like The Sunlight, Like The Moon Bright
lyrics:
Like The Sunlight, Like The Moon Bright, Always Always I Am with You
Like The Ocean, Like The River, Always I Am Flowing Towards You
Like The Sky Above, So Is Divine Love, Always Always Surrounding You
Like The Earth So Fair, Like The Birds Of The Air
Always I Am Caring For You
translation: None

title: Lingodbahavakara Lingeshwara
lyrics: Lingodbahavakara Lingeshwara\nParthishwara Mam Pahi Prabho\nPahi Prabho Mam Dehi Vibho
translation: O Creator of Linga (symbol of creation), Lord Sai of Parthi, You who bring forth Lingas, please protect us.

title: Love Is My Form, Truth Is My Breath, Bliss Is My Food
lyrics:
Love Is My Form, Truth Is My Breath, Bliss Is My Food
My Life Is My Message, Expansion Is My Life
No Reason For Love, No Season For Love, No Birth, No Death
Prema Sathya Aananda, Dharma Shanti Ananda
Shirdi Sai, Sathya Sai, Prema Sai, Jai Jai
Shirdi Baba, Sathya Baba, Prema Baba, Jai Jai

title: Ma He Ma, Ma He Ma
lyrics:
Ma He Ma, Ma He Ma
Sai Mata Jagat Janani
Ma He Ma, Ma He Ma
Vina Vadini Sarasvati Mata
Jagata Palini Gauri Mata
Ambe Bhavani Lakshmi Mata
Sai Mata Jagat Janani
translation: Worship the Mother of the Universe, Mother Sai, Mother Saraswati - Goddess of Knowledge and wisdom, who holds the Vina (stringed musical instrument). Chant the names of Mother: Amba, Bhavani and Lakshmi.

title: Madhava Gopala
lyrics:
Madhava Gopala
Nanda Nandana Ghana Shyama Gopala
Madhava Gopala
Radha Hrudaya Brindavana Lola
Murali Manohara Giridhara Bala
Jaya Hari Govinda Radhe Gopala (2)
translation: Chant the names of Lord Madhava, Gopala, beloved son of Nanda, the dark-hued divine flute-player and the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain. Glory to you, the enchanting indweller of Radha's heart.

title: Madhava Mohana Shyama Gopala
lyrics:
Madhava Mohana Shyama Gopala
Muralidhara Mukunda Gopala
Dvapara Yuga Me Krishna Gopala
Mira Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Shyama Manohara He Nanda Lala
Partipurishvara Sai Gopala
translation: Lord Sai of Parthi is the enchanting flute player Lord Krishna of Dvapara age, Lord of Meera and son of Nanda.

title: Madhava Madhava
lyrics:
Madhava Madhava
Madhusudhana Hari Madhava
Mathuradhipathe Keshava
Madhava Madhava
Mohana Murali Mukunda Madhava
Pavana Parthi Murahara Madhava
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Jaya Hari Madhava
translation: Chant the names of Lord: Madhava, Madhusudhana, Hari, Keshava, Mukunda and Murahara. Reciting the name of Madhava sanctifies and purifies our hearts. Glory be to Hari.

title: Madhura Madhura Murali Ghana Shyama
lyrics:
Madhura Madhura Murali Ghana Shyama
Madhuradhipathe Radhe Shyama
Surdas Prabhu He Giridhari
Mira Ke Prabhu Hrudhaya Vihari
translation: Chant the name of the charming and divine flute-player, Lord Krishna, Lord of Madhura, Lord of Meera and of Surdas.

title: Madhurapuri Nilaye Meenakshi
lyrics:
Madhurapuri Nilaye Meenakshi
Kamakoti Nilaye Kamakshi
Madhurapuri Nilaye Meenakshi
Kashipuradhishwari Vishweshwari
Parthipuradhishwari Saishwari
translation: Bow to Mother Meenakshi of Madurai, wish-fulfilling Mother Kamakshi of Kanchi, Mother Vishweshwari of Kashi, and Mother Sai of Parthi.

title: Madhusudana Hare Madhava
lyrics:
Madhusudana Hare Madhava
Shri Vasudeva Janardana (2)
Hare Keshava Narayana
Shri Hari Govinda Manamohana
Janardana Jagatpalana
Dinavana Duhkha Bhanjana
Aravinda Lochana Anandana
Shri Vasudeva Janardana (2)
translation: Chant the names of: Lord Krishna, slayer of the demon Madhu; Lord Vishnu with beautiful hair; enchanting Govinda; protector of the Universe, Lord Krishna; blissful, lotus-eyed Lord and remover of miseries of the afflicted, Lord Vasudeva (Krishna), and the eternal Lord Sai

title: Madhuvana Ke Murali Vala
lyrics:
Madhuvana Ke Murali Vala
Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
Nandalala Nandalala
Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
Gopi Manohara Gopala Bala
Partipurishvara He Sai Bala
Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
translation: O prince of Nanda, charming and enchanting flute-player of Madhuvan, O sustainer of the universe, stealer of Gopis' hearts, O Lord of Parthi, dance on, dance on (in the hearts of devotees).

title: Madhuvana Murali Shyama Bhajo
lyrics:
Madhuvana Murali Shyama Bhajo
Madhura Manohara Krishna Bhajo
Radha Madhava Shyama Bhajo
Brindavana Gopala Bhajo
translation: Chant the names of Lord Shyama, who moves about in the Madhuvana garden. Lord Madhava, the Lord of Radha, and Lord Gopala.

title: Madhuvana Sanchari Shyama Murari
lyrics:
Madhuvana Sanchari Shyama Murari
Hey Madhusudhana Muralidhari
Madhuvana Sanchari Shyama Murari
Madhava Mohana Mayura Mukutadhara
Mathura Natha Prabhu Giridhari
Mathura Natha Sai Giridhari
translation: Chant the name of Lord Shyama (Krishna), slayer of the demon Mura, who moves about in the beautiful garden of Madhuvana and that of the Lord of Mathura, who held the mountain aloft (to protect His devotees). He is the divine flute player wearing a peacock feather on His head.

title: Maha Ganapathe Gajanana
lyrics:
Maha Ganapathe Gajanana
Uma Maheshwara Priya Nandhana
Maha Ganapathe Gajanana
Gana Nayaka Vandhitha Charana
Tava Charanam Bhava Bhaya Harana
Uma Maheshwara Priya Nandhana
translation: Take refuge at the feet of Lord Ganesha, dear son of Mother Uma and Lord Shiva, to ward off the fears of worldly existence.

title: Maha Ganapathe Namostute
lyrics:
Maha Ganapathe Namostute
Matanga Mukha Namostute
Uma Priya Suta Namostute
Omkareshvara Namostute
translation: I bow to You, great Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced Lord, the dear son of Mother Uma (Parvati) and the Lord of primeval Om.

title: Mahadeva Shiva Shambo Shankara
lyrics:
Mahadeva Shiva Shambo Shankara
Maheshwara Shiva Shambo Shankara
Mahadeva Shiva Shambo Shankara
Maulishwara Shiva Shambo Shankara
Madanantaka Shiva Shambo Shankara
Mruthyunjaya Shiva Shambo Shankara
translation: Worship Lord of Lords, Lord Shiva, who wears the crescent moon, is ever ecstatic, and who is eternal.

title: Mana Bangaru Parthi Baba
lyrics:
Mana Bangaru Parthi Baba
Mana Singara Vadhana Sai
Mana Bangaru Parthi Baba
Antaryami Baba
Sarvantaryami Sai
translation: Our precious ("Golden") Baba residing in Parthi, with beautiful face, is the indweller of all.

title: Mana Ek Baar Hari Bol
lyrics:
Mana Ek Baar Hari Bol
Hari Hari Bol Hari Bol
Mana Ek Baar Hari Bol
Hari Pitha Hari Matha
Hari Guru Gnana Datha
Chidananda Rupa Hari Pathitha Pavana Hari Ek Baar Hari Bol
translation: Repeat in your mind the name of Hari (Vishnu), who is Mother, Father, Guru, bestower of knowledge and uplifter of the down-trodden.

title: Mana Mandir Me Aao Sai
lyrics:
Mana Mandir Me Aao Sai
Sai Bhagavan Darsha Dikhao
Mana Mandir Me Aao Sai
Sada Nirantara Bhajo Sai Ram
Giridhara Nagara Natavara Shyam
Sai Bhagavan Darsha Dikhao
translation: O Lord Sai, come into the temple of my heart and grant me Your darshan. Let us worship and constantly remember Lord Sai Ram and the dark-hued Krishna.

title: Mana Mohana Nandalal
lyrics:
Mana Mohana Nandalal
Mana Mohana Madhusudana Brindavana Nandalal
Mana Mohana Nandalal (2)
Brindavana Nandalal
Mana Mohana Madhusudana Brindavana Nandalal
translation: Son of Nanda, Lord Madhusudana, captivates the mind and heart, and moves about in Brindavan garden with delight.

title: Manasa Bhajore Guru Charanam
lyrics:
Manasa Bhajore Guru Charanam
Dustara Bahavasagara Taranam
Guru Maharaj Guru Jai Jai
Sai Nath Sadguru Jai Jai
Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya -
... Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om
Arunachala Shiva Arunachala Shiva -
... Arunachala Shiva Aruna Shivom
Omkaram Baba Omkaram Baba Omkaram Baba -
... Om Namo Baba
translation: Worship and install in your mind the feet of the Guru, otherwise, it is difficult to cross the ocean of life and death. Glory to the supreme guru, Lord Sai. Surrender to Lord Shiva of the Arunachala mountain and to Baba who is Om personified.

title: Manasa Bhajore Guru Charanam Sai Charanam
lyrics:
Manasa Bhajore Guru Charanam
Sai Charanam Pranamamyaham (2)
Nirmala Hrudaya Virajita Charanam
Sakala Charachara Vyapaka Charanam
Bhava Sagara Uddharaka Charanam
Sai Charanam Pranamamyaham (2)
translation: O Mind, worship and take refuge at the lotus feet of Lord Sai (Lord of Creation) in order to cross the ocean of life and death.

title: Mandara Maladhara Jaya Gauri Shankara
lyrics:
Mandara Maladhara Jaya Gauri Shankara
Hara Hara Pahi Trinetra
Gangadhara Bimbadhara Chandramauli Shankara
Mandara Maladhara Jaya Gauri Shankara
Mahadeva Vamadeva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shankara
Satya Dharma Shanti Prema Satya Sai Shankara
translation: Victory to Lord Shiva, who is the Lord of Gauri and wears the garland of Mandara flowers. We surrender to Lord Shiva who has three eyes, holds the celestial Ganges in His matted hair, and is adorned with the crescent moon on His head. Charming Lord Shiva is the Lord of Lords. Lord Sathya Sai, is the embodiment of truth, righteousness, peace, and love.

title: Mandir Me Aao Madhava
lyrics:
Mandir Me Aao Madhava
Madhava Keshava
Mandir Me Aao Madhava
Adi Narayana Anantha Sai
Aao Aao Atmanivasi
Radha Lola Rakhumayi Vittala
Ranga Panduranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Parthiranga Vittala
translation: Lord Madhava, please come into the temple of my heart. Chant the name of primal and eternal Lord Sai (Vishnu), the indwelling spirit and the darling of Radha who is Rakhumayi (Krishna).

title: Mandir Me Tum Ram Ho Sai
lyrics:
Mandir Me Tum Ram Ho Sai
Masjid Me Nur Mohammed
Masjid Me Allah Ho Akbar
Gurudvare Me Tu Guru Nanak
Mana Mandir Me Sai Sai
Bolo Ram Eka Hi Ram
Sab Mil Bolo Sai Ram
translation: O Lord Sai Ram, in the temples You are worshipped as Lord Sai, in the Masjid as the Almighty Nur Mohammad, in Gurudwara as the noble teacher Nanak, in the temple of the heart as Lord Sai Ram. You are One, but worshipped by different names, forms, and in various places. Let us all chant, "Sai Ram Sai Ram."

title: Mangala Dhayaka He Gananatha
lyrics:
Mangala Dhayaka He Gananatha
Pranava Swaroopa Vighna Vinasha
Mangala Dhayaka He Gananatha
He Shiva Nandhana Pahi Dhayala
Parthi Purishwara Jagat Paripala
Pranava Swaroopa Vighna Vinasha
translation: Lord Ganesha, who bestows good fortune, is the form of sacred Pranava (Om), and is the remover of obstacles. Son of Shiva, protector of the poor and helpless, is Lord Sai of Parthi, the Lord and Protector of the Universe.

title: Mangala Murthi Sai Ram
lyrics:
Mangala Murthi Sai Ram
Karuna Sindhu Sai Ram
Sai Ram Bolo Sai Ram
Mangala Murthi Sai Ram
Dina Natha Sai Ram
Anatha Rakshaka Sai Ram
Sai Ram Bolo Sai Ram (3)
translation: Chant the name of Lord Sai, who bestows good fortune, who is the ocean of compassion, who is the Lord of the foresaken and the protector of the destitute.

title: Matha Maheshwari Tribhuvana Janani
lyrics:
Matha Maheshwari Tribhuvana Janani
Prema Mayi Sathya Sai Janani
Shiva Mana Mohini Papa Vinashini
Vedha Kalamayi Kalyana Dhayini
Jagadoddharini Parthi Narayani
Prema Mayi Sathya Sai Janani
translation: Mother of three worlds, Mother Sathya Sai, whose form is Love, destroys sins and is Lord Shiva's delight. The resident of Parthi, mother of the Vedhas and the arts, bestows good fortune and sustains the Universe.

title: May We All Be Flutes Within Your Hands
lyrics:
May We All Be Flutes Within Your Hands
Let Us Be Your Melody, We'll Sing at Your Command
Krishna's Flute We'll Be We'll Sing His Melody
When Desire's Gone We Will Finally Sing His Song
Song of Love Song of Truth Let the Melody Flow Through
Song of Love Song of Truth May Our Lives Be One with You
translation: None

title: Mita Smita Sundara Mukharavinda
lyrics: Mita Smita Sundara Mukharavinda Nacho Nandalala Nandalala\nNacho Nandalala Nandalala (3)\nMira Ke Prabhu Lala Nandalala (3)
translation: Dance in ecstasy, remembering the gentle smiling lotus face of the darling son of Nanda, the Lord of Meera, Lord Krishna.

title: Mohana Rama Hey Sai Rama
lyrics:
Mohana Rama Hey Sai Rama
Pavana Nama Prashanti Rama
Mohana Rama Hey Sai Rama
Karunanidhe Prabhu Karunya Rama
Bhaktha Jana Priya Palitha Rama
Parthi Purishwara Hey Sai Rama (2)
translation: Chant the captivating and purifying name of Lord Sai Rama of Prashanti. Lord Rama, treasure of compassion and sustainer is loved by His devotees.

title: Murali Krishna Mukunda Krishna Mohana Krishna Krishna Krishna
lyrics:
Murali Krishna Mukunda Krishna Mohana Krishna Krishna Krishna
Gopi Krishna Gopala Krishna Govardhana Dhara Krishna Krishna
Radha Krishna Bala Krishna Rasavilola Krishna Krishna
Shirdi Krishna Parthi Krishna Shri Sathya Sai Krishna Krishna
translation: Chant the many names of the Lord: Krishna, Mukunda, Gopala, Govardhana, Radha Krishna, Shirdi Baba, Sai Baba

title: Murali Murali Murali Ghanashyam
lyrics:
Murali Murali Murali Ghanashyam
Mohana Murali Radhe Shyam
Murali Murali Murali Ghanashyam
Kanakambaradhara Karuna Sagara
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Nagara
Parthipurishwara Sai Shyam
translation: Chant the name of the enchanting Flute-player, Lord Sai Ghanashyama. The Lord of Meera, Lord Giridhari, wears golden colored clothing. He is Lord Sai Rama of Puttaparthi.

title: Muralidhara Gopala Madhura
lyrics:
Muralidhara Gopala Madhura
Megha Rupa Hari Manasa Chora
Muralidhara Gopala Madhura
Radha Madhava Brinda Vihara
Ananda Ghana Rupa Nama Madhura(3)
translation: Gopala, bearer of the flute, captivates our minds. Lord of Radha, Madhava, moves about in Brindavan Gardens, and chanting His beautiful and sweet name confers immense happiness.

title: Mythilipate Raghunandana
lyrics:
Mythilipate Raghunandana
Rama Raghava Rajiva Lochana
Mythilipate Raghunandana
Dinavana He Karunamaya
Kamala Nayana Kaushalya Tanaya (2)
translation: Rama, son of Raghu dynasty, consort of Mythili (Sita) whose eyes are shaped like lotus is the protector of the weak, ocean of mercy and son of Kausalya.

title: Namah Parvathi Pathaye Hara Hara
lyrics:
Namah Parvathi Pathaye Hara Hara
Hara Hara Shankara Mahadeva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadhashiva
Mahadeva Sadhadhiva
Sadhashiva Mahadeva
translation: Bow to the Lord of Lords, Lord Shiva, Lord of Parvathi, the destroyer of our sins.

title: Namo Bhagavathe Vasudevaya
lyrics:
Namo Bhagavathe Vasudevaya
Namo Bhagavathe Rama Rupaya
Namo Bhagavathe Shyama Rupaya
Namo Bhagavathe Vasudevaya
Rama Rama Ram Raghukula Tilaka Raghupathi Raghava Ram
Shyama Shayama Shyam Yadukula Tilaka Pathitha Pavana Shyam
Rama Rahim Krishna Karim Yeshu Buddha Mahavir
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Devaya
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Rupaya
translation: Bow to Lord Vishnu; to Lord Krishna of Yadav dynasty; to Lord Rama, the jewel of Raghu dynasty; ti Jesus; to Karim, to Buddha, to Mahavir; and to Lord Sai, who is fond of all faiths and religions

title: Namo Sharada Namo Sharada
lyrics:
Namo Sharada Namo Sharada Namo Sharada Mata
He Vidya Buddhi Pradayini
Ma Vina Pustaka Dharini
Bhava Bhanjani Manoranjani
Satya Saishvari Mata
Satya Saishvari Satya Saishvari Satya Saishvari Mata
Satya Saishvari Mata
translation: Bow to Mother Goddess Sharada and Mother Sai, bestower of knowledge and intelligence, and Mother of the musical arts and learning, who dispels the fears of worldly life.

title: Nanda Ke Dulare Yashoda Ke Pyare
lyrics:
Nanda Ke Lal Murali Gopal
Giridhari Govinda Radhe Gopal
Nanda Mukunda Radhe Gopal
Radhe Jaya Radhe Jaya Radhe Gopal
Radhe Radhe Radhe Gopal
Radhe Radhe Murali Gopal
Radhe Radhe Shyam Gopal
Radhe Radhe Sai Gopal
translation: Salutations to Krishna, the beloved of Radha, the joy of Nanda, the enchanting flute player, and the dark-complexioned Lord Sai Gopal.

title: Nanda Ke Lal Murali Gopal
lyrics:
Nanda Ke Dulare Yashoda Ke Pyare
Govinda Murare Dino Ke Sahare
Karuna Sagar Giridhara Nagar
Murali Manohar Sai Murare
translation: Chant the name of the darling son of Nanda and Yashoda, Lord Govinda, the ocean of mercy. The slayer of the demon Mura, and the only support of those who are afflicted and dejected, is the charming flute-player, Lord Sai.

title: Nanda Kishora Navanitha Chora
lyrics:
Nanda Kishora Navanitha Chora Radhe Gopala
Radha Lola Rasa Vilola Hey Nandala
Nandalala Nandalala
Gopari Pala Gopi Lola Giridhara Gopala
Radha Lola Rasa Vilola Hey Nandalala
Nandalala Nandalala
translation: Worship Lord Gopala - who steals our (devotee's) heart. Chant the names of the Lord: Sai Giridhara (uplifter of Govardhana Mountain) and resident of Gokul who sustains and nourishes the virtuous.

title: Nanda Kishora Navanita Chora Sai Gopala
lyrics:
Nanda Kishora Navanita Chora Sai Gopala
Govardhana Giridhari Murari He Nandalala
Nandalala Nandalala
Goparipala Gokula Bala Giridhara Gopala
Murali Lola Munijana Pala He Nandalala
Nandalala Nandalala
translation: Worship Lord Sai Gopala, who steals our (devotees') heart. Chant the names of the Lord Sai Giridhara (uplifter of Govardha Mountain) and resident of Gokul who sustains and nourishes the virtuous.

title: Nanda Nandana Hari Govinda Gopala
lyrics:
Nanda Nandana Hari Govinda Gopala
Ghana Shyama Mana Mohana (2)
Gopi Lola Gopala
Gokula Bala Gopala
He Nandalala Gopala
Ghana Shyama Mana Mohana (2)
translation: Chant the many names of the Lord: Hari, Gopala, Govinda, Ghana Shyama (dark-complexioned one). The Lord captivates the hearts of devotees.

title: Nandalala Nandalala Nandagopa Nandana
lyrics:
Nandalala Nandalala
Nanda Gopa Nandana Shri Nandalala
Nandakumara Nandalala
Navanitachora Nandalala
Nandalala Sai Nandalala
Nanda Gopa Nandana Shri Nandalala
Yasoda Bala Nandalala
Yamuna Vihari Nandalala
Nandalala Sai Nandalala
Nanda Gopa Nandana Shri Nandalala
translation: Child of Nanda is the Lord of the Gopis and stealer of butter. Born of the Yadu clan, the child of mother Yashoda resides on the banks of the Yamuna river.

title: Nandalal Yadhu Nandalala
lyrics:
Nandalal Yadhu Nandalala Nandalal Yadhu Nandalala
Nandalala Navanita Chora Radha Pyare Nandalala
Mayi Mira Manasa Chora Parthi Vihari Nandalala
Hridaya Vihari Nandalala
translation: O beloved son of Nanda, Lord Sai who moves about in Parthi has stolen our hearts like He stole the heart of Meera. Chant the name of the beloved of Radha.

title: Nandalala Navanita Chora Natavaralala Gopala
lyrics:
Nandalala Navanita Chora Natavaralala Gopala
Devaki Vasudeva Kumara
(Vasu) Deva Deva Gopala
Nandalala Navanita Chora Natavaralala Gopala
Mohana Murali Ghana Vilola
(Mana) Mohana Jaya Gopala
translation: Krishna, son of Vasudeva and Devaki, enchanting dancer who plays beautiful music on the flute is known for His child-like pranks of stealing butter from the Gopis.

title: Nandalala Yadu Nandalala
lyrics:
Nandalala Yadu Nandalala
Brindavana Govinda Lala
Radha Lola Nandalala
Radha Madhava Nandalala
translation: Krishna, son of Vasudeva and of the Yadu clan is the beloved of Radha.

title: Nandishvara He Nataraja
lyrics:
Nandishvara He Nataraja
Nandatmaja Hari Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Nagabharana Namah Shivaya
Nada Svarupa Namo Namo
Narayana Hari Narayana
translation: Lord Shiva, the cosmic dancer, the Lord of Nandi (His vehicle- the bull) is the personification of sound, and is adorned with a serpent. Salutations to Lord Shiva, Lord Sai and Lord Vishnu.

title: Narayan Narayan Bhaja Mana Narayan
lyrics:
Narayan Narayan Bhaja Mana Narayan
Shri Hari Madhava Narayan Bhaja Mana Narayan
Murali Shyam Mohana Shyam Murali Mohana Shyam
Mere Ram He Ghana Shyam Sai Sadguru Nam
translation: Chant and remember the name of Narayana and Hari. Chant the names of the enchanting flute-player Krishna who is beautiful and dark like a rain cloud; of Rama and of Sai, the true Guru.

title: Narayana Hari Nama Bhajore
lyrics:
Narayana Hari Nama Bhajore Narayana Veda Parayana
Karunabharana Bhava Bhaya Harana
Pavana Charana Patita Janavana
Narayana Hari Narayana (3)
translation: Chant and remember the name of Narayana and Hari. Chant the names of the enchanting flute-player Krishna who is beautiful and dark like a rain cloud; of Rama and of Sai, the true Guru.

title: Narayana Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om
lyrics:
Narayana Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om
Sai Narayana Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om
Shanthakara Bhujanga Shayana Padmanabha Hari Om
Sai Narayana Hari Om
translation: Glory to Sai who is Narayana. The Lord who rests on the serpent is the personification of serenity. Glory to Lord Vishnu (Padmanabha)

title: Narayana Narayana
lyrics:
Narayana Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Garuda Vahana Narayana
Kalinga Nardhana Narayana
Abhaya Dhayaka Narayana
Apadh Bandhava Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Narayana Sathya Narayana
translation: Lord Sai Narayana who has eagle as His vehicle, annihilated the cobra, named Kalinga. He is the dispeller of fear and the refuge of those in need and in difficulties.

title: Nataraja Namami Shankara
lyrics:
Nataraja Namami Shankara
Shiva Raja Shiva Shiva Shankara
Nataraja Namami Shankara
Shirdi Purishwara Shiva Shankara
Parthi Purishwara Parameshwara
Hrudayeshwara Saishwara
translation: I bow to Lord Shankara, the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi, who is the resident of our hearts.

title: Nayana Me Premadhar Vachano Me Amrithadhar
lyrics:
Nayano Me Premadhar Vachano Me Amr'thadhar
Sadguru Sai Mera Jeevana Adhar
Jeevana Ka Adhar Mera Jeevana Ka Adhar
Sadguru Sai Mera Jeevana Ka Adhar
translation: The noble teacher, Lord Sai, whose eyes are full of love and compassion, whose words are like a spring of divine nectar, is the sustainer of my life.

title: Neela Megha Ghana Shyama
lyrics:
Neela Megha Ghana Shyama
Murali Lola Ghana Shyama
Radha Madhava Shyama
Mira Ke Prabhu Shyama
Sai Krishna He Giridhari
Sai Prabho He Nandhalala
Surdas Ke Giridhari
Gopi Mohana Nandhalala
translation: Sai the dark-hued Lord Krishna, the divine flute player, Lord of Radha and Meera, the darling son of Nandha, Lord of Surdas (a devotee), and the delight of Gopis.

title: Nilakanta Gangadhara Hara Umapathe
lyrics:
Nilakanta Gangadhara Hara Umapathe
Pralayankara Abhayankara Hara Bhoothapathe
Nilakanta Gangadhara Hara Umapathe
Dama Dama Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaroo Bhaje
Nataraja Manohara Thandava Nache
Parthishwara Parameshwara Kailasha Pathe
Nataraja Manohara Thandava Nache
translation: Lord Shiva with the blue throat, the enchanting Lord of Uma, the one who wears the Holy Ganges in His matted hair is the Lord of destruction. He is the Lord of the elements who protects us and grants refuge. He is the enchanting Lord of the divine dance who dances to the sound of the celestial drum. He is the Lord of Kailasha, the supreme Lord Sai who lives in Parthi.

title: Nita Bhajan Karu Tero Nam
lyrics:
Nita Bhajan Karu Tero Nam
Partishvara Sai Ram
Sitaram Bolu Radheshyam
Partishvara Sai Ram
Guru Charanaraja Pahi Mam
Sharanagata Hu Sai Ram
Koti Koti Tujhko Pranam
Sankat Se Taro Bhagavan
Partishvara Sai Ram
translation: Everyday, I sing the names of Lord Sai of Parthi, Lord Rama and Lord Krishna, and surrender myself at the sanctifying feet of my Guru. I prostrate before You million of times, Lord; please lift me up from my grief and sorrows.

title: Nityananda Satchidananda
lyrics:
Nityananda Satchidananda
Hari Hari Hari Om Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Hari Hari Hari Om Narayana
Prema Svarupa Premandanda (2)
Hari Hari Hari Om Narayana
translation: Chant the name of Lord Narayana, Lord Sai, the ever blissful Lord, who is the embodiment of truth, awareness, bliss, and love.

title: O Baba Sai Baba Sai Isha Alleluia
lyrics:
O Baba Sai Baba
Sai Isha Alleluia
O Baba Sai Baba
Sai Rama Hari Hari
Sai Kr'shna Balihari
Sai Allah Ho Akbar
Sai Nanak Jai Jaikar
Sai Baba Antaryami
Sai Buddha Pranamami
Buddham Sharanam Gachchami
Satya Saisha Sharanam Gachchami
translation: I take refuge in Buddha and Sathya Sai, the indwelling spirit, known by different names to people of different faiths: Jesus, Allah, Nanak.

title: O Bhagavan O Bhagavan
lyrics:
O Bhagavan O Bhagavan Araja Suno Mere Sai Bhagavan
Partipuri Ke Tum Ho Datha
Brindavan Ke Tum Ho Datha
Sab Bhakto Ke Man Ko Bhatha
Par Utaro Naiya Mori
Sai Ghanashyama, Sai Ghanashyama
translation: Lord Sai of Puttaparti is also the blue-complexioned Krishna, Lord of Brindavan, and the beloved of all devotees. I pray and urge You to help me cross the ocean of birth and death.

title: Oh Loving Lord of All The Worlds
lyrics:
Oh Loving Lord of All The Worlds, Let Me Be Your Devotee
Your Divine Light Is All I am, All I Can Ever Be
God Above Me, In And Of Me, All I Love Is Yours
Lord Above Me, In And Of Me, All I See Is Yours
Let Me Come Into Your Heart And Stay Forever More (Baba)
translation: None

title: Om Bhagwan Shri Sathya Sai Babaya Namah
lyrics:
Om Bhagwan Shri Sathya Sai Babaya Namah (4)
Tu He Sakala Jagath Ke Swami
Tu He Mere Ma Bap Bhaiya
[Tu He Mere Sai Baba]
Om Bhagwan Shri Sathya Sai Babaya Namah (4)
translation: Bow to Bhagwan Baba. You are the Lord of the Universe and our mother, father and brother.

title: Om Jai Jai Guru Sai Mukunda
lyrics:
Om Jai Jai Guru Sai Mukunda
Sai Mukunda Sai Mukunda
Om Jai Jai Guru Sai Mukunda
Satchidananda Ananda Chanda
Bala Mukunda Devaki Nanda
translation: Glory and victory to Divine Guide, Lord Sai Mukunda, who is embodiment of truth, awareness and bliss. Glory to young Mukunda, the beloved son of Devaki and Nanda.

title: Om Muruga Om Muruga
lyrics:
Om Muruga Om Muruga
Va Muruga Vadivel Azhaga
Shakthi Vadivela Sai Muruga
Sharavana Bhava Guha Sai Muruga
translation: Please come, Sai Muruga (Lord Subrahmanya) the resident of Sharavana, bearing the all-powerful spear with divine energy.

title: Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om
lyrics:
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om Om Namah Shivaya...
... Shivaya Namah Om
Shiva Shiva Hara Hara Haraya Namah Om Hara Hara Shiva Shiva...
... Shivaya Namah Om
Hara Hara Mahadeva Hara Hara Mahadeva (2X)
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Baje
Dhimitaka Dhimitaka Mr'danga Baje
Hara Hara Mahadeva Hara Hara Mahadeva (2X)
translation: Lord Shiva, the embodiment of the primeval Om, the Lord of Lords, dances to the sound of the hand drum and mridanga (a percussion instrument).

title: Om Namo Bhagavate Vasudevaya
lyrics: Om Namo Bhagavate Vasudevaya (3)\nOm Namah Shivaya Om Namo Narayanaya (2)\nOm Namo Bhagavate Vasudevaya (Hari)
translation: Salutations to Lord Krishna, son of Vasudeva, to Lord Shiva and to Lord Narayana.

title: Om Namo Nama Om
lyrics:
Om Namo Nama Om, Nama Om
Om Namo Nama Om, Nama Om
Sundaraya Nama Om, Sura Vanditaya Nama Om
Madhavaya Nama Om, Madhusudhanaya Nama Om
Eswaraya Nama Om, Parameshwaraya Nama Om
Karanaya Nama Om, Narayanaya Nama Om.
translation: Salutations to the beautiful Lord who is worshipped by the Devas, the one who is known as Madhava and Madhusudhana. Salutations to the Supreme Lord of the Universe. Salutations to Lord Narayana who is the Primordial reason for all existence.

title: Om Sai Om Narayana Oh My Sweet Lord
lyrics:
Om Sai Om Narayana Oh My Sweet Lord
Due To Some Good Karma Sai, I Have Come To Thee
Let The Vibhuti of Love Flow Sai, Between You And Me
Om Sai Om Narayana Oh My Sweet Lord
We Try To Be What You Want Us To Be, So Guide Us Merciful Lord
Work On Us, Be Kind To Us, Show Us The Right Path
translation: None

title: Omkara Rupa Om Shiva Bala Pranavakara Shadanana
lyrics:
Omkara Rupa Om Shiva Bala Pranavakara Shadanana
Omkara Rupa Om Shiva Bala
Om Veda Rupa Om Gita Rupa Om Nada Rupa Saisha
Nada Veda Gita Rupa Saisha Jagadisha (3)
translation: Pray to the Six faced Lord Subrahmanya, the son of Shiva, who is the primordial sound Om itself. He is the embodiment of the Vedas, Divine Sound (Nada) and Gita. He is our Lord Sai Muruga the Lord of the Universe.

title: Padmanaba Narayana
lyrics:
Padmanaba Narayana
Badri Vasa Narayana
Parthi Vasa Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narayana Satya Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
translation: Chant the names of Lord Narayana, who has a lotus on his navel, (signifying his creative power) Chant the names of Lord Sai of Parthi, and of Badri.

title: Panduranga Vitthala Jaya Pandharinatha Vitthala
lyrics:
Panduranga Vitthala Jaya Pandharinatha Vitthala
Panduranga Vitthala Jai Pundarikaksha Vitthala
Panduranga Vitthala Jaya Pandharinatha Vitthala
Vitthala Jaya Vitthala Purandara Vitthala (2x)
Vitthala Jaya Vitthala Jaya Rakhumayi Vitthala
translation: Salutations to Lord Vitthala of Pandari, the Lord of the devotee Purandara and the Lord of Rakhumayi (Rukmini).

title: Panduranga Vitthale Hari Narayana
lyrics: Panduranga Vitthale Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Govinda (3)\nBhajo Narayana Govinda
translation: Chant the names of Narayana, Vitthala, Hari and Govinda.

title: Par Karo Uddhar Karo Prabhu Parthipuri Bhagwan
lyrics:
Par Karo Uddhar Karo Prabhu Parthipuri Bhagwan
Hare Ram Ram Ram Ghana Shyam Shyam Shyam Hey Sai Natha Bhagwan
Deena Dhayakara Karuna Murthi Kali Yuga Avathar Sai Bhagwan
Allah Sai Buddha Zoarastra Yeshu Kristu Bhagwan
translation: O Lord of Parthi, save me from the cycle of birth and death. Merciful Lord Sai Ram, incarnation of the Kali age, You are Lord Rama, Krishna, Allah, Buddha, Zoroaster, and Jesus.

title: Parameshwara Parthishwara
lyrics:
Parameshwara Parthishwara
Pavana Nama Saishwara
Parameshwara Parthishwara
Jagadheeshwara Hrudhayeshwara
Jagadhoddhara Jatadhara
Pavana Nama Saishwara
translation: Lord Shiva, with matted hair, is the Lord of the Universe. Lord Sai with the pure and sacred name is the indweller.

title: Parthi Puri Me Janam Liya
lyrics:
Parthi Puri Me Janam Liya Jo Sai Rama Nam Hai
Mayura Mukuta Dhara Murali Manohara Sai Shyama Nam Hai
He Shiva Shankara Uma Maheshvara Sai Shambho Nam Hai
Sai Shambho Nam Hai ( Sai Baba Nam Hai)
He Parameshvara Partipurishvara Tu Hi Mera Pran Hai
translation: Lord Sai Ram born in Parthi is the embodiment of Lord Krishna who wears the crown of peacock feathers. He is Shankara, Lord of Uma. The supreme Lord of Parthi is my very life-breath.

title: Parthi Purisha Prashanthi Vasa Sai Murare
lyrics:
Parthi Purisha Prashanthi Vasa Sai Murare
Sai Murari Sai Murari Sai Murari Sai Murari
Hey Rishikesha Hrudaya Nivasa Hrudaya Nivasa
Sai Murari Sai Murari Sai Murari Sai Murari
translation: Chant the name of the Lord residing in Parthi, Lord Sai Murari. Victory to the Lord of Rishikesha (place of pilgrimage) and the Lord residing in our hearts, Lord Sai Narayana.

title: Partishvara Satya Saishvara
lyrics:
Parthi Purisha Prashanthi Vasa Sai Murare
Sai Murari Sai Murari Sai Murari Sai Murari
Hey Rishikesha Hrudaya Nivasa Hrudaya Nivasa
Sai Murari Sai Murari Sai Murari Sai Murari
translation: Chant the name of the Lord residing in Parthi, Lord Sai Murari. Victory to the Lord of Rishikesha (place of pilgrimage) and the Lord residing in our hearts, Lord Sai Narayana.

title: Partishvari Jagat Janani
lyrics:
Partishvara Satya Saishvara
Daya Karo Sai Narayana
Shri Sai Narayana (Sai)
Bhava Sagaroddhara Bhuvanavana
Daya Karo Sai Narayana (2x)
Shri Sai Narayana (Sai)
translation: Lord Sathya Sai Narayan of Parthi, please shower Your mercy on us. Lord Sai, Lord of the Universe, supports the ocean of life and protects all those who surrender to Him.

title: Pashupati Tanaya Bala Gajanana
lyrics:
Partishvari Jagat Janani
Jaya Jaya Jaya He Sai Janani
Partishvari Jagat Janani
Veda Kalamayi Devi Bhavani
Nada Vidyamayi Narayani
Karuna Sadani Karunamayi Ma
Charanam Sharanam Sai Ma
Jaya Jaya Jaya He Sai Janani
translation: Take refuge at the feet of Mother Sai, residing in Puttaparthi. She is the embodiment of all the Vedas, the arts, knowledge and learning, and the repository of mercy and benevolence.

title: Patita Pavana Ram
lyrics:
Pashupati Tanaya Bala Gajanana
Tum Ho Vighna Vinasha Ganesha
Tum Ho Vighna Vinasha
He Shiva Nandana Pahi Gajanana
Vidya Buddhi Pradata
Mangala Kare He Mangala Kara He
Sundara Sai Ganesha Ganesha
Sundara Sai Ganesha
translation: Chant the name of Lord Ganesha, the son of Lord Shiva (Pashupati). The elephant-faced Lord destroys obstacles and protects. He grants (spiritual) knowledge and bestows auspiciousness.

title: Pranamami Shri Durge Sai Narayani
lyrics:
Pranamami Shri Durge Sai Narayani
Jai Jagadambe Ambe Bhavani
Pranamami Shri Durge Sai Narayani
Mahishasura Samharini
Maha Maya Dukha Harini
translation: I pay obeisance to Mother Durga, Sai Narayani, Mother of the Universe, the destroyer of the demon Mahishasura and remover of sorrows of the vast illusion.

title: Prasanna Ho Satya Sai Ganesha
lyrics:
Prasanna Ho Satya Sai Ganesha
Prathama Pujita Vighna Vinasha
Prasanna Ho Satya Sai Ganesha
Pashankusha Dhara Parama Pavitra
Mushika Vahana Gajanana
Prasanna Ho Satya Sai Ganesha
Lambodara He Shambhu Kumara
Ambika Tanaya Gajanana
translation: At the outset, worship Lord Sai Ganesha to remove all obstacles. The supremely sacred Lord uses a mouse as conveyance and carries the symbolic rope and weapon in his hands. He is the potbellied son of Mother Ambika (Parvati).

title: Prashanthi Nilayam Paramanin Alayam
lyrics:
Prashanthi Nilayam Paramanin Alayam
Deiva Swarupanin Devalayam
Kaliyuga Devanin Karunalayam
Maanavar Mohikkum Manthralayam
(Janma) Papa Vimochanin Charanalayam (2)
translation: Prashanthi Nilayam is the abode of our Lord Sai, the Embodiment of Divinity. It is the temple of Compassion of the Lord of Kaliyuga, the temple adored by all. It is also the temple of the Lotus Feet of the One who liberates us from all sins.

title: Prathama Bhajore Ganapathi Sai
lyrics:
Prathama Bhajore Ganapathi Sai
Jai Jai Jai Jai Sai
Buddhi Pradhayaka He Gana Nayaka
Ganapathi Sai He Sukhadayi
Jai Jai Jai Jai Sai
translation: First we worship Lord Sai Gajanana, the Lord of the demi-gods, provider of happiness and liberation. Salutations to Lord Sai.

title: Prathama Pujya Deva Gajanana
lyrics:
Prathama Pujya Deva Gajanana
Partipurishvara Sai Gajanana
Prathama Pujya Deva Gajanana
Parvati Nandana Bala Gajanana
Pranava Svarupa Sai Gajanana
Maya Vinashaka Mushika Vahana
Mangala Kara He Sai Gajanana
translation: Worship first Lord Ganesha and Lord of Parthi. The son of Mother Parvati, the life breath of all, is the destroyer of illusion, and bestower of good fortune.

title: Prathama Vandana Gauri Nandana
lyrics:
Prathama Vandana Gauri Nandana
He Shiva Nandana Pahi Gajanana
Prathama Vandana Gauri Nandana
Ekadanta Gunavanta Vinayaka
Vighna Harana Shubha Mangala Charana
Pranava Swarupa Sai Gajanana
translation: Pay obeisance to Lord Ganesha and Lord Sai. Gajanana the beloved son of Shiva and Gauri, is the remover of obstacles, the bestower of auspiciousness, and the life force for all beings.

title: Prem Ishwar Hai Ishwar Prem Hai
lyrics:
Prem Ishvar Hai Ishwar Prem Hai
Har Dhadkan Me Sai Sama Hai Ishwar Prem Hai (Prem Ishwar...)
Ram Rahim Krishna Karim
Zorastra Yeshu Nanak
Koi Bhi Nam Japore Manuva Ishwar Prem Hai
translation: Love is God, God is Love Lord Sai is the sustainer of each and everyone's breath O mind! Worship any name of the Lord Rama, Krishna, Rahim, Zoraster, Jesus or Nanak

title: Prem Se Gao Mangala Nam
lyrics:
Prem Se Gao Mangala Nam
Govinda Gopala Bolo Hari Nam
Prem Ke Sindhu Dina Ke Bandhu
Karunamaya Sai Nayanabhiram
Govinda Gopala Bolo Hari Nam
Hare Krishna Hare Ram Sairam Sairam (3)
Sairam Sairam (3)
Hare Krishna Hare Ram Sairam Sairam
translation: Chant the auspicious name of Lord Sai, with love and devotion. He is an ocean of love and compassion. Chant the name of Lord Govinda, Gopala, Rama and Krishna.

title: Prem Se Gao Pavana Nam
lyrics:
Prem Se Gao Pavana Nam
Rama Rama Raghu Nandana Rama
Prem Se Gao Pavana Nam
Janaki Rama Jaya Raghu Rama
Jaya Sai Rama Jaya Satya Nama
translation: Sing the purifying and uplifting name of Lord Rama of the Raghu Dynasty, with love and devotion Salutations to the Lord of Janaki, and to Lord Satya Sai

title: Purandhara Ranga Hare Vittala
lyrics:
Purandhara Ranga Hare Vittala
Pandhari Ranga Hare Vittala
Purandhara Ranga Hare Vittala
Nara Hari Ranga Hare Vittala
Murahara Ranga Hare Vittala
translation: Chant the many names of Lord Ranga (Vishnu): Purandhara Vittala, Narahari, and Krishna who destroyed the demon Mura.

title: Pyare Nandalal Darshan Dijo
lyrics:
Pyare Nandalal Darshan Dijo
Yashoda Ke Bal Darshan Dijo
Pyare Nandalal Darshan Dijo
Natavaralal Darshan Dijo
Giridhara Bal Darshan Dijo
translation: O Lord Krishna, beloved son of Nanda and Yashoda, You are the supreme dancer and the one who held the Govardhana Mountain up on one finger. Please give us Your Divine Vision.

title: Radha Ramana Narayana
lyrics:
Radha Ramana Narayana
Vedabharana Narayana
Bhava Bhaya Harana Narayana
Pavana Charana Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana (3)
translation: Lord Narayana, the delight of Radha, from whom the Vedas have emanated, destroys the fear of birth and death. worship at His holy feet.

title: Radhe Govinda Gopala Jaya Govinda Radhe Gopala
lyrics:
Radhe Govinda Gopala Jaya Govinda Radhe Gopala
Govinda Govinda Gopala (Sai) (2)
Radhe Govinda Gopala Jaya Govinda Radhe Gopala
Krishna Madhusudhana, Madhusudhana Krishna
Gopala Gopala Gopala (Sai) (2)
translation: Chant the name of Govinda, the consort of Radha. Praise be to Krishna, the Divine cowherd - known as Madhusudhana.

title: Radhe Govinda Radhe Gopala Sairam
lyrics:
Radhe Govinda Radhe Gopala Sairam
Bansidhara, Bansidhara He Chittha Chora
He Natavara, He Natavara Nanda Kishora
Ghana Shyama Sundara Megha Shyama Sundara Sairam
translation: O Govinda, beloved of Radha, the One who stole our hearts with the Divine music of His flute, O son of Nanda, O Krishna who dances with the Gopis, we sing to thee. We pray to Gopala who is as dark as the clouds and is also our beloved Sairam.

title: Radhe Shyama Hey Ghana Shyama
lyrics:
Radhe Shyama Hey Ghana Shyama
Radha Madhava Mangala Dhama
Radhe Shyama Hey Ghana Shyama
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Megha Shyama
Megha Shyama Megha Shyama
Jaya Jaya Jaya Brindavana Dhama
translation: Chant the name of the Lord of Radha, Lord Madhava, the dark-complexioned Lord of Brindavan, who confers good fortune. Glory to Lord Krishna

title: Radhika Jivana
lyrics:
Radhika Jivana
Krishna Janardhana
Radhe Govinda Radhe Gopala
Devaki Nandana (Vasu)
Nanda Nandana He Gopika Ranjana
Murali Mohana
Radhe Govinda Radhe Gopala
Shri Madhusudana (Krishna)
translation: Lord Krishna, the very life of Radha, is the beloved son of Devaki and Nanada. He delights the hearts of Gopi(s) with His enchanting flute.

title: Raghu Kula Bhushana Rajiva Nayana
lyrics:
Raghu Kula Bhushana Rajiva Nayana
Ishvaramba Nandana Satya Sai Rama
Janaki Vallabha Lavanya Rama
Nirupama Sundara Sugunabhirama
Prashanti Nilayam Pavana Dhama
Jaya Jaya Rama Prabhu Sai Rama
translation: Glory to the jewel of teh Raghu dynasty, the beloved of sita, the lotus-eyed Lord Rama. Recite the sacred name of Lord Sai of Prashanti Nilayam, the son of Easvaramma. Glory to the handsome, and the most virtuous Lord Rama.

title: Raghupathe Raghava Raja Rama
lyrics:
Raghupathe Raghava Raja Rama
O Raja Rama
Raghupathe Raghava Raja Rama
Dasharatha Nandana Raja Rama Kaushalyatmaja Sundara Rama
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Rama Raghava Mohana Megha Shyama
Jai Jai Ram Sai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Rama Rama Sita Rama
Patita Pavana Sitapathe Rama
translation: Chant the name of beautiful Lord Rama, son of Dasharatha and Kaushalya, Lord of Sita, and savior of the helpless. Victory to Rama, Lord of the Raghu dynasty

title: Raghupathe Shri Rama Chandra
lyrics:
Raghupathe Shri Rama Chandra Raghava Dhaya Nidhe (2)
Madhava Shri Radhikesha Govinda Hare Krishna (2)
Pashupathe Shri Parvathisha Shankara Sadashiva (2)
Sai Rama Sai Shyama Satya Sai Madhava (2)
translation: Chant the name of the compassionate and merciful Lord Rama of the Raghu dynasty; of Krishna; Lord of Radha; of Shiva; Lord of Mother Parvati and of all beings; of Sai who is Rama, Krishna and Shiva

title: Raghupati Raghava Raja Ram
lyrics:
Raghupati Raghava Raja Ram
Patita Pavana Sai Ram
Raghupati Raghava Raja Ram
Patita Pavana Sai Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Sai Ram
translation: Glory to Lord Rama, Lord of the Raghu dynasty and to Sai Ram, who protects the weak and the destitute.

title: Raghupati Raghava Raja Ram Patita Pavana Sita Ram
lyrics: Raghupati Raghava Raja Ram Patita Pavana Sita Ram\nSita Ram Jaya Sita Ram Bhaja Pyare Tu Sita Ram\nIshvara Allah Tere Nam Sab Ko Sanmati De Bhagavan
translation: Victory to you, Lord Rama, King of the Raghu dynasty, and Lord of Sita, the protector of the poor and helpless. Sing praises to our beloved Lord Sita Ram, known also as Ishvara and Allah. O Lord, please endow us with intelligence.

title: Rahimana Rahimana Rama Rahim
lyrics:
Rahimana Rahimana Rama Rahim
Sai Ram Sai Ram Krishna Karim
Rahimana Rahimana Rama Rahim
Buddha Zorashtra Nanak Yeshu
Vo Bhi Thum Ho Sai Thum Ho
Bhajore Manuva Rama Rahim
Rama Rahim Bhajo Krishna Karim
translation: O mind, sing praises of the one God, with many names: Krishna, Rama, Rahim, Sai , Buddha, Zoroaster, Nanak, Jesus and Allah.

title: Raksha Raksha Jagadhishwara
lyrics:
Raksha Raksha Jagadhishwara
Parthipuri Parameshwara
Pahi Pahi Parameshwara
Dehi Dehi Thava Pada Seva
translation: Protect us, O lord of the Universe! Protect us, O Lord of Puttaparthi! Protect and bless us. Pray Thee to grant us the opportunity to server Thy Lotus Feet.

title: Ram Rahim Ko Bhajane Vale
lyrics:
Ram Rahim Ko Bhajane Vale Tere Pujari Baba
Tera Nam Ek Sahara (3)
Tumhi Ho Gita Tumhi Ramayan Tumhi Ho Veda Puran
Tera Nam Ek Sahara (3)
translation: We devotees sing the names of Ram and Rahim (Allah) who are one and the same. Lord Sai who personifies the scriptures of Gita, Ramayana and the Vedas is our only refuge.

title: Ram Ram Bhajo Mana
lyrics:
Ram Ram Bhajo Mana Hare Hare (3)
Raghupati Raja Rama Ram
Patita Pavana Sai Ram
Sita Ram Bhajo Mana Hare Hare
Sai Ram Bhajo Mana Hare Hare
translation: O mind, worship Lord Rama of the Raghu dynasty, Lord of Sita, who uplifts and purifies the fallen.

title: Rama Charana Sukhadayi Bhajore
lyrics:
Rama Charana Sukhadayi Bhajore (3)
Rama Nama Ke Do Akshara Me
Sab Sukha Shanti Samayi Re
Sai Natha Ke Charano Me Akar
Jivana Saphala Banao Re
translation: Seek comfort at the feet of Rama/Sai. Chanting the two-syllabled name of Rama (or Sai) provides peace to the seeker and makes one's life fruitful.

title: Rama Hare Sai Krishna Hare
lyrics:
Rama Hare Sai Krishna Hare Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Hare
Allah Ishvar Sai Hare
Nanak Yeshu Buddha Hare
Zoarastra Mahavir Sai Hare
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Hare
Rama Hare Sai Krishna Harey (3)
(Baba) Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Hare
translation: Chant the name of Rama, Sai Krishna. Recite the name of Sai who is the lover of all faiths. Lord Sai is none other than Allah, Nanak, Buddha, Jesus, Zoraster, Mahavira.

title: Rama Krishna Govindha Narayana
lyrics:
Rama Krishna Govinda Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Rama Krishna Govinda Narayana
Shri Lakshmi Ramana Narayana
Om Anantha Narayana (3)
translation: Chant the names of Lord Rama and Krishna and the eternal Lord Narayana, Lord of Lakshmi.

title: Rama Lakshmana Janaki
lyrics: Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki (4)
translation: Sing the names of Rama, Lakshmana and Janaki, Glory to them and Hanuman.

title: Rama Namo Rama Namo Rama Namo Sai Rama Namo
lyrics:
Rama Namo Rama Namo Rama Namo Sai Rama Namo
Dasharatha Nandhana Rama Namo
Vasudeva Nandhana Krishna Namo
Rama Namo Rama Namo Rama Namo Sai Rama Namo
translation: Chant the name of Lord Rama, who is the son of King Dasharatha. Chant the name of Lord Krishna who is the dearest son of Vasudeva.

title: Rama Rama Jaya Raghukula Thilaka
lyrics:
Rama Rama Jaya Raghukula Thilaka
Rajiva Lochana Ram
Eshwaramba Suta Jaya Jagavandana
Ratnakara Kula Deepa (3)
translation: Worship the lotus-eyed Lord Rama, jewel of the Raghu dynasty, and Sai, the son of Mother Eshwaramma, light of the Ratnakara dynasty and adored by the whole Universe.

title: Rama Rama Rama Jaya Kodhanda Rama
lyrics:
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Kodhanda Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Kalyana Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Vaidhehi Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Pattabhi Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Athmabhi Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Shri Sai Rama
translation: Salutations to the auspicious Lord Rama, who carries a bow. He is the Lord of Sita, and was crowned King of Ayodhya. He is Lord Sai, the indweller of all.

title: Rama Rama Rama Rama
lyrics:
Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram (3)
Rama Rama Rama Sita Rama Rama Ram
He Rama Rama Ram
He Sai Rama Ram
Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram (2)
translation: Chant the name of Rama, Lord of Sita and our dear Lord Sai Ram.

title: Rama Rama Sai Ram Sita Rama Radhe Shyam
lyrics: Rama Rama Sai Ram Sita Rama Radhe Shyam (3)\nDasharatha Nandana Sita Ram Vasudeva Nandana Radhe Shyam\nIshwaramba Nandana Parthi Purishwara Sai Ram (2)
translation: Chant the name of Rama, Lord of Sita and son of King Dasharatha; Chant the name of Krishna, Lord of Radha and son of Vasudeva; Chant the name of Sai of Puttaparthi, son of Eshwaramma

title: Rama Sumira Mana Rama Sumira Mana
lyrics:
Rama Sumira Mana Rama Sumira Mana
Rama Sumira Mana Ram
Janaki Vallabha Dasharatha Nandhana
Ramachandra Shri Ram (2)
Bhaja Mana Sita Ram Ram Bhaja Mana Sita Ram
Bhaja Mana Radhe Shyam Shyam Bhaja Mana Radhe Shyam
Bhaja Mana Sai Ram Ram Bhaja Mana Sai Ram
translation: O mind, chant the name and worship the name of Lord Ram, The beloved of Sita, and the Prince of King Dasharatha; of Lord Krishna (the beloved of Radha), and of Lord Sai Ram.

title: Ramachandra Prabhu Raghu Vamsha Nama
lyrics:
Ramachandra Prabhu Raghu Vamsha Nama
Sita Pathe Jaya Janaki Rama
Ramachandra Prabhu Raghu Vamsha Nama
Ahalyoddharaka Sugunabhi Rama
Ravana Samhara Kodhanda Rama
Ayodhya Rama Pattabhi Rama
Nava Nava Komala Shri Sai Rama
Sita Pathe Jaya Janaki Rama
translation: Chant the name of Rama of the Raghu dynasty, consort of Sita (Janaki), savior of Ahalya, and who is endowed with beauty and goodness. Rama, who carries a bow, and slew Ravana, was crowned King of Ayodhya.

title: Ranjani Niranjani Parthi Ranjani
lyrics:
Ranjani Niranjani Parthi Ranjani
Simha Vahini Sai Bhavani
Ranjani Niranjani Parthi Ranjani
Matha Maheshwari Meena Lochani
Kama Pradhayini Kathyayini
Parthi Ranjani Mukthi Dhayini
translation: O Mother who is enchanting and pure, the One who has the lion as Her vehicle, O Sai Bhavani, Mother of the whole universe who's eyes are beautiful like the fish the One who fulfills all desires Our Mother Sai of Parthi who grants liberation itself, we pray to thee.

title: Rasa Vilola Nandalala
lyrics:
Rasa Vilola Nandalala
Radha Madhava Nandalala
Rasa Vilola Nandalala
Nanda Kishora Nandalala
Navanita Chora Nandalala
Nandalala Sai Nandalala (2)
translation: Glory to Krishna, Nanda's son and Radha's beloved, who danced the ecstatic dance with the Gopis.

title: Ratnakara Kula Bhushana
lyrics:
Ratnakara Kula Bhushana
Rajiva Nayana Sai Narayana
Ratnakara Kula Bhushana
Ishvaramba Nandana
Tribhuvana Vandita Mrudu Charana
translation: The entire Universe adores and worships at the soft and tender feet of the lotus-eyed Lord Sai Narayana, jewel of the Ratnakara dynasty, son of Easvaramma.

title: Ravo Ravo Ranga Sai
lyrics:
Ravo Ravo Ranga Sai
Radha Lola Ramaniya Roopa
Ravo Ravo Ranga Sai
Venu Vilola Vijaya Gopala
Vedoddhara Vara Sai Rama
translation: Please come Lord Sai of beauteous form. Krishna, Lord of Radha, who delights in playing the flute, fosters the Vedas. He is the wish- fulfilling Sai Ram

title: Remind Me My Lord
lyrics:
Remind Me My Lord (3), Who I Am
I Am Om, I Am Om, Eternal Om
Through this Life of Distraction and of Illusion, Remind Me My Lord, Who I Am
I AM Truth, I Am Peace, Divine Bliss
Ananda Svaroopa, Hey Prema Svaroopa, Remind Me MY Lord Who I Am
I AM Love, I Am Love, Pure Love
translation: Self Explanatory

title: Sada Shiva Ranjani Sai Janani
lyrics:
Sada Shiva Ranjani Sai Janani
Shambhavi Shankari Durga Bhavani
Sada Shiva Ranjani Sai Janani
Akhilandeshvari Raja Rajeshvari
Mata Maheshvari Narayani
translation: Mother Goddess, the consort and eternal joy of Lord Shiva, is the giver of life,and Mother of all the worlds.

title: Sadguru Brahma Sanatana He
lyrics:
Sadguru Brahma Sanatana He
Parama Dayaghana Pavana He
Janmaja Dukha Vinashana He
Jagadoddharana Karana He
Sai Krishna Janardhana He
Bhava Bhaya Jaladhi Tarana He
translation: Worship the merciful Noble Guru, Lord Sai Krishna, the embodiment of the eternal Brahma (infinity). He is the savior of the world and the destroyer of worldly fears and sorrows. O Lord Sai Janardhana ! Take us across the ocean of our mundane existence.

title: Sadguru Namam Madhura Mayam
lyrics:
Sadguru Namam Madhura Mayam
Sundara Rupam Jyothir Mayam (Ati)
Shyamala Vadanam Shanti Mayam
Prema Pradhayaka Pavana Namam
Papa Vinashaka Prabhu Namam
Sada Bhajeham Sai Namam
translation: Let us ever chant the name of the true Guru, suffused with sweetness, beauty, divine effulgence and peace. His sanctified name grants love and dispels sins.

title: Sai Avatara Yuga Avatara
lyrics:
Sai Avatara Yuga Avatara
Dina Dayala Sankata Hara
Sai Avatara Yuga Avatara
Sai Brahma Sai Vishnu
Sai Maheshvara
Sai Avatara Yuga Avatara
Satya Sai Prema Sai
Sab Dharmo Ke Baba Sai
Sai Parameshvara
translation: Merciful Lord Sai is the destroyer of grief and is the incarnation of this kali Age. He is Brahma, Vishnu, Maheshvara, the beloved of devotees and supporter of all religions.

title: Sai Baba Is Coming to Fill up Your Hearts
lyrics:
Sai Baba Is Coming to Fill up Your Hearts
Fill up Your Hearts from His Ocean of Love
Sai Baba Is Coming to Fill up Your Hearts
Fill up Your Hearts and Quench Your Thirst for Love
Share it With Others It's the Miracle of Love
Fill up Your Hearts (3) from His Ocean of Love
translation: None

title: Sai Gajanana Dinavana
lyrics:
Sai Gajanana Dinavana
Sindhura Vadana Shritajana Palana
Sai Gajanana Dinavana
Ambika Tanaya Amaradhishvara
Aganita Gunagana Ananda Dayaka
translation: We surrender to the elephant faced Lord Ganesha, who showers grace and protection on helpless ones. The immortal son of Ambika, with countless divine qualities grants bliss to everyone.

title: Sai Hai Jivan
lyrics:
Sai Hai Jivan, Jivan Satya Sai
Sai Mera Jivan Sahara
Sai Hai Jivan, Jivan Satya Sai
Tere Bina Sai Sab Hai Andhera
Par Karo Meri Jivan Naiya
Charana Lagalo Mujhe Sai Kanhaiya
translation: Sai,You are my life. Without You there is darkness (ignorance) in my life. Kindly help me cross the ocean of life and death. Sai Krishna! Accept me at Your lotus feet.

title: Sai Hamara Ham Sai Ke
lyrics:
Sai Hamara Ham Sai Ke Aisa Prema Hamara
Sai Ram Hamara Sai Ram Hamara
Satya Sai Hai Nam Tumhara Shirdi Sai Avatara
Sai Ram Hamara Sai Ram Hamara
Hindu Muslim Sikh Isai Sabka Palana Hara
Sai Ram Hamara Sai Ram Hamara
translation: Our love for each other is such that Sai is ours and we are His. Sathya Sai, who took the form of Shirdi Sai, is also the protector of Hindus, Moslems, Sikhs and others.

title: Sai Mahadeva
lyrics:
Sai Mahadeva
Sathya Sai Mahadeva
Parthi Purishwara He Sai Baba Maheshwara He
Sai Mahadeva
Nirupama Guna Sadhana Sai Neeraja Dala Nayana
Vibhuthi Sundara He Sai Baba Maheshwara He
translation: Lord of Lords, Lord Sai Baba of Parthi with lotus-shaped eyes, is the incarnation of God. He is exceedingly merciful.

title: Sai Namame Anandame
lyrics:
Sai Namame Anandame
Sai Gitame Adbutame
Sai Rupame Jyotirmayame
Sai Dharmame Sarva Sevaye
translation: Blissful is Sai's name and transcendental are Sai bhajans. His form is effulgent and service to all is the path He shows.

title: Sai Namame Brahmanandam
lyrics:
Sai Namame Brahmanandam Sai Charaname Divyanandam
Satya Sai Roopame Nayananandamu
Leela Vinodhame Sai Sankalpamu
Premanandame Sai Saumya Rupamu (2)
translation: Chanting the name of Sai and taking refuge at his feet give us eternal bliss. His form is delightful to our eyes. Everything is a sign of His will. Love is His beautiful form.

title: Sai Narayana Narayana
lyrics:
Sai Narayana Narayana
Sathya Narayana Narayana
Gana Lola Prabhu Narayana
Dina Pala Jaya Narayana
translation: Chant the name of the merciful and omniscient Lord Sai Narayana who loves music and protects the afflicted.

title: Sai Natha Bhagavan
lyrics:
Sai Natha Bhagavan Sai Natha Bhagavan
Satyam Shivam Sundaram Sai Natha Bhagavan
Sai Natha Bhagavan Sai Natha Bhagavan
Buddham Sharanam Gachchami
Sangham Sharanam Gachchami
Dhammam Sharanam Gachchami
Saisha Sharanam Gachchami
translation: Worship and pray to Lord Sai, whose form is beauty, auspiciousness and truth. Surrender to Buddha, to the Holy company. Adhere and take refuge in righteousness (Dharma) and in Lord Sai.

title: Sai Natha Dina Natha Brahma Rupa Sadguru
lyrics:
Sai Natha Dina Natha Brahma Rupa Sadguru
Nirakara He Akara Satya Sai Sadguru
Sai Natha Dina Natha Brahma Rupa Sadguru
Mata Pita Sadguru Sakala Tu Hi Sadguru
Sakala Tu Hi Sadguru Sakala Tu Hi Sadguru
Sai Natha Dina Natha Brahma Rupa Sadguru
Omkara Sadguru Nirvikara Sadguru
Nirvikara Sadguru Omkara Sadguru
translation: Divine Preceptor, Lord Sai, is the embodiment of Brahma. He is our true guru, mother, and father. The unchanging and the formless is incarnated now in the form of Sai Guru.

title: Sai Ram Ghana Shyam
lyrics:
Sai Ram Ghana Shyam Bhagavan Tumhara Nam
Tuma Bin Koi Nahi Rakhvale
Tuma Bin Koi Nahi Apat Samhale
Tuma Bin Prem Koi Nahi Denevale
Tum Ho Mere Atma Ram Baba
Bhagavan Tumhara Nam
Sai Ram Tumhara Nam
translation: O Lord Sai Rama, You are the dark-hued Lord Krishna. There is no one but You to save us. Please protect us in times of distress and shower Your Love on us, Sai Rama, the indweller of my heart.

title: Sai Rama Bolo Satya Sai Rama Bolo
lyrics:
Sai Rama Bolo Satya Sai Rama Bolo
Sita Vallabha Tulasi Rama Lakshmana Sevitha Rama
Sai Rama Bolo Satya Sai Rama Bolo
Atma Rama Ananda Dhama
Ahalyoddharaka Karunya Rama
Maruti Sevitha Hrudayatha Rama
translation: Chant the name of Lord Ram (consort of Sita) adorned with a Tulsi garland. He was worshipped by Lakshmana and served by Hanuman. He liberated Ahalya. He is Loed Sai, the indweller, who grants bliss, and is full of mercy.

title: Sai Rama Hare Sai Krishna Hare
lyrics:
Sai Rama Hare Sai Krishna Hare(2)
Raghupathi Raghava Rama Hare
Rajiva Lochana Rama Hare
Sai Rama Hare Sai Krishna Hare
Parthipurishwara Sai Hare
translation: Protect us, O lord of the Universe! Protect us, O Lord of Puttaparthi! Protect and bless us. Pray Thee to grant us the opportunity to server Thy Lotus Feet.

title: Sai Sai Smarana Karo
lyrics:
Sai Sai Smarana Karo
Guru Charana Kamala Dhyana Karo
Keshava Madhava Bhajana Karo
Sadguru Sai Seva Karo
translation: Remember Sai's name and invoke the Lotus Feet of the Divine Teacher. Chant the names of Keshava and Madhava, and serve our True Guru Sai.

title: Sai Sundara Sundara
lyrics:
Sai Sundara Sundara
Vyaghrambaradhara Hare Hari Hara
Sai Sundara Sundara
Ananda Guna Mandira Sundara
Natana Sundara Bhuvana Sundara
translation: Worship the beautiful Lord Sai, who is Lord Hari (Vishnu) and Hara (Shiva) dressed in a tiger skin. Embodiment of bliss and Virtues, Sai Shiva is the beautiful cosmic dancer, in all three Worlds.

title: Samba Sadashiva Sai Shiva
lyrics:
Samba Sadashiva Sai Shiva
Gangadhara Hara Gauri Vara
Samba Sadashiva Sai Shiva
Nartana Sundara Natana Manohara
Natya Priyakara Nataneshvara
Nata Priyakara Nataneshvara
translation: Lord Shiva, consort of Gauri, is endowed with the Ganges. The beautiful and enchanting Lord loves his blissful cosmic dance. Lord Sai is His embodiment.

title: Sanathana Sarathe Saisha
lyrics:
Sanathana Sarathe Saisha
Sarvottama Guna Nidhe Paramesha
Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Ram
Sura Muni Vandita Sadhu Jana Poshita
Sarva Janashraya Saisha
Sadguru Deva Satchidananda
Sashtanga Sharanam Mama Gurudeva
Sashtanga Sharanam Mama Saideva
Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Ram
translation: Lord Sai Ram is the eternal charioteer and repository of noblest virtues. He protects saints and sages who pay obeisance to Him. We prostrate and surrender to the protector and refuge of all beings. Lord Sai the Divine Master.

title: Sarva Dharma Priya Deva
lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Priya Deva
Sathya Sai Deva
Allah Yeshu Buddha Aur Nanak
Zoarastra Mahavir Thum Ho
Rama Hi Thum Ho Krishna Bhi Thum Ho
Vishwa Rupa Thum Ho Sai Vishwa Rupa Thum Ho
translation: O Lord Sathya Sai, You are the loving Lord of all faiths, worshipped as Allah, Jesus, Buddha, Nanak, Zoroaster, Mahavira, Rama, and Krishna. Your cosmic form pervades the Universe.

title: Satya Dharma Shanti Prema Swaroopa
lyrics:
Satya Dharma Shanti Prema Swaroopa Prashanti Nilaya Deva
Rama Ho Krishna Ho Sai Rama Deva
Shiva Shakti Swaroopa Baba Hey Prema Pradayaka Baba
Hey Prashanti Nilaya Baba Hey Purnavathata Baba
Allah Ho Maula Ho Sai Rama Deva
